short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simultaneously create interactive demonstrations, step-by-step guides, and videos in just minutes with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Interactive Training Content and Product Walkthroughs in Minutes

Transform your user experience with guided. Turn your browser activity into dynamic product demos, step-by-step guides, and how-to videos with ease.

How It Works:

1. Capture Your Browser Activity: Record your screen directly from your browser. guided. auto-captures screens, keyboard entries and clicks, ensuring you capture every detail effortlessly.

2. Edit and Produce in Minutes:

- Once the screen recording ends, you'll be taken into the guided. web application where you can edit and produce that recording into three distinct output formats in just minutes.

     - Create Interactive Product Demos: Transform your recording into a 
     clickable, interactive demo. Let users experience your product firsthand, 
     diving into its features seamlessly.

     - Generate Step-By-Step Guides: Capture essential steps from your demo 
     recording. guided.'s AI crafts comprehensive, easy-to-follow guides that 
     can be shared or embedded across your platforms.

     - Produce How-To Videos: Record yourself and your screen from your 
     browser. guided. automates zooms and transitions, creating engaging 
     how-to videos that bring your instructions to life.

Why Choose guided.?:

- Effortless Customization: Tailor text, colors, and styles to match your brand, ensuring a consistent and professional appearance.

- Seamless Sharing: Share or embed your demos and guides in campaigns, websites, or knowledge bases with ease.

- Insightful Analytics: Measure user engagement, track conversion rates, and gather feedback directly within guided. Respond to questions in real-time to enhance user experience and support.

Solving Your Challenges:

- Static Screenshots Fall Short: Showcase your product's full potential with interactive demos that captivate your audience. This enhances understanding and pace of adoption from new and existing users.

- Inefficient Asset Creation: Streamline the process and produce high-quality content in multiple formats, quickly and efficiently.

- High Production Challenges: Simplify asset production and maintenance without the need for a full in-house team.

Why Guided. Stands Out:

- 10x Faster Creation: Accelerate your content creation process, saving you time and resources. Give your team or customers the resources they need, at scale.

- Enhanced User Experience: Deliver a guided, interactive experience that makes understanding your product or company's tech stack easy and enjoyable.

- Ready to elevate your product demos, employee training, and customer support? Install the Guided Chrome Extension today and transform outcomes for everyone involved.
